EmailTemplate.name: SBA Statement Analysis.SBA Webinar Reminder.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how to get funding for COVID-19 Losses
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As a reminder, join NCR and the SBA today, April 29, 2021 at 4:00 p.m. ET, for a free virtual webinar to learn about the SBA’s Restaurant Revitalization Fund (RRF) that provides funding of up to $10M per business to help restaurants and other eligible businesses keep their doors open. You’ll learn more about the program, eligibility requirements, and steps you need to take to apply. Featured Speakers: Murali Patnam, Vice President & GM, NCR Hospitality - Small & Medium Business Nicola Montagna, Small Business Administration, Special Assistant Office of Capital Access Anna Lucas, Small Business Administration, Senior Advisor for the Office of Field Operations ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> We are looking forward to seeing you! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
